name: Make Sail
description: ï»¿Make boats and sail them. Survive an ocean of storms and beasts to find better pieces to make your ship bigger, faster, stronger, prettier, stranger, wilder: more yours.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz dual Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4400 (OpenGL 4.5 or higher required) Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 9XX Series Nvidia or higher (OpenGL 4.5 or higher required) Storage: 4 GB available space
